Brand Foundations

Logo

Use the master logo and approved variations only. Maintain clear space equal to the logo height and avoid distortion.

Colors

  • Flow Train Blue: #2BAEE4
  • Near Black: #231F20

Typography

  • Headings: Inter Bold
  • Body: Inter Regular
